article.aria-label: School Closed! eLearning Day! **All Committee Meetings for April have been cancelled!

h3.a: School Closed! eLearning Day! **All Committee Meetings for April have been cancelled!

div.div: Click here to go to eLearning Day assignments. They are always listed under Families>eLearning Plan. Also, please check out the eLearning update from Superintendent Taylor in the News and announcements section! ALSO! the Board Committee Meetings scheduled for April have been cancelled.

img.alt: School Closed! eLearning Day! **All Committee Meetings for April have been cancelled! Featured Photo

article.aria-label: PBS KIDS programs for grades Pre=K-5 from 6am-5pm, Monday-Friday

h3.a: PBS KIDS programs for grades Pre=K-5 from 6am-5pm, Monday-Friday

div.div: Your local PBS KIDS station, has worked tirelessly to curate programs and resources to support all of our children while schools are closed. In an effort to provide students with educational television programs that do not require broadband internet, we created special blocks of television programming on our main TV channel, 12.1. All blocks of programming have associated hands-on activities, printables, articles, games and apps that can be found on our at-home learning site.

img.alt: PBS KIDS programs for grades Pre=K-5 from 6am-5pm, Monday-Friday Featured Photo

div.div:
1.) go to https://beta.teambuildr.com/login 2.) Use the following credentials to login: username: (your full email address) password: hornets!
Send us a video of you putting in work at home and we will share on school social media each day!

img.alt: HUSD4 Physical Training Program Featured Photo

div.div: MediaCom is Offering Free Internet for Low and Reduced Families during the COVID-19 Extended Closure, Check out the information here!

h2.a: Watch a Message from Heyworth Elementary Staff!

div.div: We offer up to 29 college credits by graduation, AP classes, BACC classes, an excellent Early Childhood Program, and a before and after school program for parents in need of extended daycare! Come visit us!!
Location: HJHHS - JH Room 211, Heyworth District Calendar
Location: HJHHS - JH Room 211, Heyworth District Calendar
Location: HJHHS - JH Room 211, Heyworth District Calendar

div.strong: See our district through the eyes of our educators!
